title: Suffering

tokens.lyric: So many saints have journeyed this road;

lines.raw: [G]So many saints have journeyed this road;

tokens.lyric: No one could make the pathway
complete;

lines.raw: [Em]No one could make the pathway [G6]complete;

tokens.lyric: Now at last He opens the way, calls us to come, waits for us all;

lines.raw: [D7]Now at last He opens the way, calls us to come, waits for us all;

tokens.lyric: All the host of men and angels failed to do the will of Heaven;

lines.raw: [G]All the host of men and angels failed to do the will of Heaven;

tokens.lyric: Now the Lord is still awaiting, you alone must answer His call.

lines.raw: [B7]Now the Lord is still awaiting, you alone must answer His call.

tokens.lyric: Glory concealed, He suffers again,

lines.raw: [G]Glory concealed, He suffers again,

tokens.lyric: Wrongly accused of lowliest crimes,

lines.raw: [Em]Wrongly accused of lowliest crimes,

tokens.lyric: Though His path is thorny and long

lines.raw: [G]Though His path is thorny and long

tokens.lyric: Still I must go, follow my Lord;

lines.raw: [D7]Still I must go, follow my Lord;

tokens.lyric: In His presence Eden blossoms,

lines.raw: [G]In His presence Eden blossoms,

tokens.lyric: So a dungeon may be Eden;

lines.raw: [Em]So a dungeon may be Eden;

tokens.lyric: Just to be with my beloved,

lines.raw: [G]Just to be with my beloved,

tokens.lyric: I'd endure all torture and pain.

lines.raw: [D7]I'd endure all torture and pain.

tokens.lyric: I give my pledge to go with my Lord, I

lines.raw: [G]I give my pledge to go with my Lord, I

tokens.lyric: too shall walk the way He has gone;

lines.raw: [Em]too shall walk the way He has gone;

tokens.lyric: Though I meet the shadow of death,

lines.raw: [G]Though I meet the shadow of death,

tokens.lyric: He is my life, I am His own;

lines.raw: [D7]He is my life, I am His own;

tokens.lyric: Strong desire swells within me,

lines.raw: [G]Strong desire swells within me,

tokens.lyric: Leading me to go be with Him;

lines.raw: [Em]Leading me to go be with Him;

tokens.lyric: In my heart such strong desire,

lines.raw: [G]In my heart such strong desire,

tokens.lyric: Not a one can stand in my way.

lines.raw: [D7]Not a one can stand in my way.

tokens.lyric: Shameless disgrace! You tie Him in chains

lines.raw: [G]Shameless disgrace! You tie Him in chains

tokens.lyric: Scorning my Lord, you lead Him away;

lines.raw: [Em]Scorning my Lord, you lead Him away;

tokens.lyric: Words and pictures witness your sin;

lines.raw: [G]Words and pictures witness your sin;

tokens.lyric: All men shall, judgment shall fall;

lines.raw: [D7]All men shall, judgment shall fall;

tokens.lyric: Blind officials ridicule Him,

lines.raw: [G]Blind officials ridicule Him,

tokens.lyric: Still the high priests; mock the Saviour;

lines.raw: [Em]Still the high priests; mock the Saviour;

tokens.lyric: Do you mean to force upon us

lines.raw: [G]Do you mean to force upon us

tokens.lyric: Tragedy and suffering again?

lines.raw: [D7]Tragedy and suffering again?
